name: Disrupt (Keryan Rigal)
description:
Welcome to Disrupt, a FPS Game where you have to save and escape a living Art Deco hotel.

Controls are pretty simple:
- WASD to move
-Space to Jump ( you can double jumb by pressing again while in air)
-Maintain Space in Air to Hover
-LeftMouseClick to shoot (once you get the gun) 
-Q to Melee Attack
-Shift to Dash
